mapper.update: update sys_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, username, nickname, password, telephone, email,type,status,remark from sys_user
